choices.text:
### System:
You are an AI assistant that follows instruction extremely well. Help as much as you can.

### User:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for today presuming no dietary restrictions.

### Response:


Based on your preferences, I have prepared a sample healthy meal plan for you for today with no dietary restrictions.

Breakfast:
- Greek yogurt (2 cups) with mixed berries and honey
- Whole grain toast with avocado spread and scrambled eggs

Lunch:
- Grilled chicken breast (4 oz) with roasted vegetables (carrots, broccoli, and bell peppers) and brown rice
- Quinoa salad with cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, red onion, and lemon vinaigrette dressing

Dinner:
- Baked salmon (4 oz) with steamed asparagus and quinoa
- Steamed cauliflower rice with avocado and lime wedges

Snacks:
- Apple slices with almond butter
- Carrots and hummus
- Greek yogurt with berries

I hope this meal plan meets your expectations. Let me know if you need any further assistance.
